about_the_game:
In this little game you have to throw needles into the needle bed. In this case, the needles must not touch each other. The game is on the reaction speed, so you need to choose the exact moment for the throw in order to seat all the needles there. Use your mouse buttons for throws. Good luck to you.

Features
  • Reaction Speed: The game is designed to test your reaction speed. You need to choose the exact moment to throw the needle into the needle bed to avoid any collisions.
  • Precision and Accuracy: Seating the needles without allowing them to touch each other requires precise aiming and accurate throws. You'll need to develop your hand-eye coordination to succeed in the game.
  • Strategic Planning: As the needle bed may have a limited number of slots, strategic planning becomes important. You'll need to analyze the layout of the needle bed and plan your throws accordingly to maximize your score.
  • Challenging Gameplay: The game offers a challenging experience as you strive to seat all the needles without any collisions. Each throw requires concentration and careful timing, adding to the overall difficulty of the game.
  • High Score Competition: Pincushion encourages players to aim for high scores. You can compete with yourself or challenge friends to see who can achieve the highest score by skillfully placing the needles in the needle bed.

name: Pincushion

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: intel core i3
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1030
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WINDOWS 10
  • Processor: intel i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • Storage: 50 MB available space

short_description: Pincushion is a quick and addictive game where your goal is to throw needles into a cushion without letting them touch. Test your reflexes and precision as you aim for a high score while avoiding any collisions. Can you master the art of needle throwing in this challenging and fast-paced game?
